mapper.select: SELECT alt.type_code AS alt_type_code, alt.`name` AS alt_name, alt.description AS alt_description, alt.object_version_number AS alt_object_version_number, alv.value_code AS alv_value_code, alv.type_code AS alv_type_code, alv.`name` AS alv_name, alv.description AS alv_description, alv.object_version_number AS alv_object_version_number FROM agile_lookup_type alt LEFT JOIN agile_lookup_value alv ON alt.type_code = alv.type_code WHERE alt.type_code = #{typeCode}
